channel.title: The Best of Radial Blur
channel.description:
Radial Blur is a weekly deep and underground house program on MyHouse-YourHouse Radio. Bay Area native Ornette is your host and selector for the show.
This podcast is a distilled version of the program and features his personal favorite picks and guest spots from the show's run of 5+ years. There's absolutely no filler in these archives so the frequency of updates varies.
To hear the show live, you can tune in at www.myhouse-yourhouse.net every Thursday night at 8pm PST or 0400 GMT (early Friday mornings in the U.K.) There is a shoutbox where you can chat with other listeners and an extensive forum and interactive schedule featuring deep house and ecletic dj's from around the world.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Deep House Radio With Ornette & Special Guests
channel.itunes:author: Ornette
channel.itunes:summary:
Radial Blur is a weekly deep and underground house program on MyHouse-YourHouse Radio. Bay Area native Ornette is your host and selector for the show.
This podcast is a distilled version of the program and features his personal favorite picks and guest spots from the show's run of 5+ years. There's absolutely no filler in these archives so the frequency of updates varies.
To hear the show live, you can tune in at www.myhouse-yourhouse.net every Thursday night at 8pm PST or 0400 GMT (early Friday mornings in the U.K.) There is a shoutbox where you can chat with other listeners and an extensive forum and interactive schedule featuring deep house and ecletic dj's from around the world.

item.title: Episode 19 - April 19th, 2012 - Ryan Wilber
item.description: For your immediate attention: Massive two hour house set here from guest and good friend Ryan Wilber. No amount of superfluous, flowery bluster will do the outing justice, which, knowing my penchant for enthusiastic blabber and self-promo, is in itself something worth note. Let's just call it what it is: A full-tilt overdose of free form joy from a man that continuously puts the currently prevailing dj methodology of sterile, monotonous sets and uninspired club nights on notice. Huge thanks to Ryan for sharing with us. Truly one of his best sessions for Radial Blur ever. *This set was originally aired live Thursday, April 19th, 2012 on My House Your House Radio. www.myhouseyourhouse.net

item.title: Episode 18 - February 24th 2011 - Ornette
item.description: Here's a 2 hour slice from the broadcast on February 24th. Lots of new jams here, a lively session filled with a variety of vibes from deep to disco to tech, a few classics, and wrapped up with a couple downtempo floaters to let you down easy! Tracklisting: Difyl - Another Chance (Astroglide Remix) - New Era Gavin Boyce - Rooftop Soul - Nordic Trax Ross Couch - Stargazer - Body Rhythm Francis Jilla - Dreams - Flapjack Biomin H - Galactic Center - Pinup Onur Ozman - Egg (Andrew Chibale Remix) - Next Dimension Matt Veloce - Let's Get Some Love - Parker Musicworks Doc Martin - Set Me Free (Sneak Remix) - Shaboom Inland Knights & Da Sunlounge - Little Bit More - Borrowed Peckos & Color Breed - Off The Record - Baker Street Tedd Patterson - Remote Control (Honey Dijon & Manuel Remix) - Nervous Bryan Zentz - Double R (todd Bodine Remix) - Amam Budai & Vic - I'm Zondori - Witty Tunes Jackie Misfit - Kundi La Mapendo - Doppelganger Dionigi - I'm In A Strange Situation - Quantistic Division P-rez - Mr. Roachclip (P-rez's Zig-zaggin Mix) - Blunted Funk Phil Weeks - I'm So High - Robsoul Divided Souls - Mousemusic is Life feat. Wilkine Brutus (Karol XVII & MB Valence Loco Dub) - Diamondhouse Phil Weeks - All Day Every Day - Robsoul Matt Shrewd - Boogie Beatz - Bambino Bgb feat. nate Bova - Com Forca (This Is The Life) - Dessous Statedlife - Soul Touching - Selekta Maddslinky feat.Tawiah - Further Away - Tru Thoughts Vanessa Daou - Consequences (Blank & Jones Late Night Mix) - Kid *This set was originally aired live Thursday, February 24th, 2011 on My House Your House Radio. www.myhouseyourhouse.net

item.title: Episode 17 - October 28th, 2010 - Josh Eldo
item.description: San Diego transplant Josh Eldo is truly one of the North Bay's finest house offerings. His track selection and programming is impeccable, proving once again that its not only what you play but how you play it. We cut this mix at an hour and ten minutes so it was cd-ready for those of you that like to roll. Essential listening for fans of tech house and futuristic discofied shizz. Tracklisting Mighty Mouse - New York Dolls (original mix) Flight Facilities - Crave You ft. Giselle (C90's remix) Kano - It's A War (SS UK edit) Dan Berkson & Daniela Stickroth - Ghost In The Attic Rainer Weichhold - Reis (Carlo Lio remix) The Martin Brothers - Steal Drums Edwin Ooosterwal - Beat The Dirt (original mix) Chuck Love - How We Get Down Hauswerks - Layback Layo & Bushwacka - Now Is The Time Claude Von Stroke - Monster Island (Christian Martin mix) Plushy - Vast Data (original mix) Ruben Sanchez - Arabian Dream (original mix) Christian Martin - Polar Bear Newcleus - Jam On It (Claude Von Stroke mix) Mark Henning - Super Sonic Dan Berkson & James What - Ghosts (original mix) *This set was originally aired live Thursday, October 28th, 2010 on My House Your House Radio. http://www.myhouse-yourhouse.net
